modName: The Black Star Renamed Azuras Black Star
summary: This mod renames \"The Black Star\" as \"Azura\'s Black Star\" so that you don\'t have to scroll all of the way down through your soul gems to recharge your weapon.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/IceburgModding][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/15827-1-1349192119.png[/img][/url][/center]
This mod renames \"The Black Star\" as \"Azura\'s Black Star\" so that you don\'t have to scroll all of the way down through your soul gems to recharge your weapon.
author: Iceburg
